title: NZ MSI Viewing Partys
body:
Calling all the Kiwi LoL Fans!

The best way to experience the Mid Season Invitational Finals is on the **BIG SCREEN** amongst the cheers and gasps of your fellow summoners. Hoyts and Riot Games have paired up to make exactly that possible and its going to go **OFF**.

New Zealand has 2 Viewing Parties being hosted by Hoyts Cinemas in:
[Auckland - Sylvia Park ](https://www.facebook.com/events/168213433576041/) brought to you by [University of Auckland LoL Club](http://facebook.com/uoalolclub)
[Christchurch - Riccarton ](https://www.facebook.com/events/1560614950905770/) brought to you by [Southern Summoners](https://www.facebook.com/SouthernSummoners/)

Both events will have groups hosting them with some LoL Swag and other mini-games available. Remember that if you book your tickets online, you'll also receive a 3-day IP boost!

[Find tickets HERE](http://www.hoyts.co.nz/movies/2016/league_of_legends_2016_mid_season_invitational.aspx)
